results.title: Case Report and Literature Review: Bisphosphonate, Sirolimus, and Atenolol Treatment in a 4-Year-Old Child Diagnosed with Gorham-Stout Disease
results.text_hl: The @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ underwent 11 months of combination treatment with @CHEMICAL_Diphosphonates @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004164 @@@bisphosphonate@@@, @CHEMICAL_Sirolimus @CHEMICAL_MESH:D020123 @@@sirolimus@@@, and @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@, and MRI showed mild degree of reduction in the @<m>DISEASE_Mouth_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009059 @@@paraspinal lesions@@@ at L1-L5.

citations.NLM: Park SJ, Yoo JW, Ahn MB. Case Report and Literature Review: Bisphosphonate, Sirolimus, and Atenolol Treatment in a 4-Year-Old Child Diagnosed with Gorham-Stout Disease Pharmaceuticals (Basel). 2023 Oct 23;16(10):. PMID: 37895975
